summary:
Newer Stronger Lydia!
She Knows The Way Of The Voice!
Shes Essential!
descriptionHtml:
This Is My First Mod So Be Nice! I always Wanted Lydia To Be Stronger, That Means No Skyrocketing By A Giant, Killing Dragons By Herself (She Has Done It) Being A Mage, Archer, One Handed, Two Handed All Rolled Into Her!

Shes Essential, Magicka,Health & Stamina 999

All Skills 100! She even comes with a few supplies

I edited her a Little bit.

She even knows the way of the voice, Shes also a expert mage. 

Shes into the Marriage Faction Also

Endorse If You Like:)

She Can Also Turn Into A Werewolf (Untested)

I Can Change Her Voice If It Isn\'t To Your Liking

UPDATE! FORGOT MESHES DOWNLOAD 1.01
SUPER OVERPOWERED LYDIA IS A GO! 

Credit To foretrenty For Skyrim NPC Editor:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554
author: FutureMoneyGamer
